name: Word Construction Set
overview: Educational game from New Zealand for the Amiga CD32 intended to teach children reading skills, spelling and vocabulary. Construct words from blocks of sound and visual patterns for Reading Skills, Spelling, Vocabulary. Over 3000 professionally recorded parts of speech. 1000s of word pictures and sentences. Create and hear your own fun words. Try them out in a sentence. • Blends • Digraphs • Vowels • Diphthongs • Prefixes • Suffixes • Compounds • Homophones • Latin Roots
